devdoc.details: This contract provides functions for calculating exchange rates and validating impact in trades.

params.fromAmount: The amount of the source asset.
params.fromAsset: The address of the source asset.
params.toAmount: The amount of the target asset.

params.exchangeRate: The calculated exchange rate for the trade.
params.isBuy: A flag indicating whether it's a buy (true) or sell (false) trade.

returns._0: The validated impact for the trade.

devdoc.title: LensFacet

calculateExchangeRate(address,uint256,ui.notice: Calculate the exchange rate between two assets for a given trade.

getNonce(address).notice: Get the current nonce for a given account.

validateImpact(uint256,uint256,uint256,b.notice: Validate impact for a trade based on exchange rate, price, and maximum allowed impact.
